wikipedia.title: Abraham Washington
wikipedia.extract: Brian Bary Jossie (born February 2, 1978), better known by his ring name Abraham Washington (abbreviated A. W.), is an American professional wrestler and former professional wrestling manager. He is best known for his time in WWE.

opinions.details: 这应该是出处于运动用语，因为LL Cool J是个运动迷。比如，全州最佳all state，全国all country，etc，这专辑他想说他是世界最佳。
